entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 29. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 10:48 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Flurries. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning. Flurries beginning near noon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the morning. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 10:48 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming west 40 gusting to 60 in the evening then northwest 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 10:48 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
